item.title: I've defended my PhD thesis!
item.description: Yesterday, September 21th 2017, I have officially defended my PhD thesis!! It was entitled “Machine learning for ophthalmic screening and diagnostics from fundus images”. You can find its English version here, and the Spanish version here. Most of the code of each of the contributions is available on my github profile. Feel free to clone the repositories and experiment with them!
